main event: One acorn or funnel-shaped object, white in color, was observed in South Weymouth, Massachusetts on 10 November 1956.
interesting points: The object appeared to be the size of a grapefruit at arm's length., The observation lasted two hours and fifty minutes., The object was initially reported as possibly being a balloon or aircraft., It was noted that the object had a green glow at the sides., The sighting involved two civil guards on duty.
